com.android.mailcommon

Interface MultiAdapterSpinner.FancySpinnerAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, MergedAdapter.ListSpinnerAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    MultiAdapterSpinner

    public static interface MultiAdapterSpinner.FancySpinnerAdapter
extends MergedAdapter.ListSpinnerAdapter
    A basic adapter with some callbacks added so clients can be involved in spinner behavior.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canSelect(int position)
      Whether or not an item at position should become the new selected spinner item and change the spinner item view.

      Handle a click on an enabled item.
      void onShowPopup()
      Fired when the popup window is about to be displayed.
